events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item does not fit and I would like to request a refund for it. Please advise on the next steps.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
Assigning the refund request case to the Customer Service Representative team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your recent order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you have the original packaging for the item you want to return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and yes, I still have the item in its original packaging, unopened.
Thank you for the details. You can return the item within 14 days for a full refund. I will email you the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth process and will send the item back today.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to see if you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Since your refund has been processed successfully and no further issues were reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
